 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (PathDashPathEffect)

Detailed Description

Dash the drawn path by stamping it with the specified shape.

This only applies to drawings when the paint's style is STROKE or STROKE_AND_FILL. If the paint's style is FILL, then this effect is ignored. The paint's strokeWidth does not affect the results. 

 //Example: draw a rectangle with side stamping by dashed drawn path
 //create path, paint
 Path path;
 Paint paint;
 paint.setColor(Color::BLACK);
 paint.setStyle(Paint::STYLE_STROKE);
 path.addRect(0.0, 0.0, 100.0, 100.0, Path::DIRECTION_CW);
 //create a base object - PathEffect
 PathEffect pe;

 //create a polymorphism object - PathDashPathEffect
 pe = new PathDashPathEffect(path_for_stamp, 1.0, 0, PathDashPathEffect::STYLE_MORPH);
 paint.setPathEffect(pe);
 //draw on canvas
 canvas->drawPath(path, paint);

Definition at line 36 of file PathDashPathEffect.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gaia::graphics::PathDashPathEffect::Style

Define the style effect of target object.

Enumerator:
STYLE_TRANSLATE 

Translate the shape to each position.

STYLE_ROTATE 

Rotate the shape about its center.

STYLE_MORPH 

Transform each point, and turn lines into curves.

Definition at line 39 of file PathDashPathEffect.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::graphics::PathDashPathEffect::PathDashPathEffect ( const Path &  shape,
float  advance,
float  phase,
Style  style 
)

Dash the drawn path by stamping it with the specified shape.

This only applies to drawings when the paint's style is STROKE or STROKE_AND_FILL. If the paint's style is FILL, then this effect is ignored. The paint's strokeWidth does not affect the results.

Parameters:
shapeThe path to stamp along
advancespacing between each stamp of shape
phaseamount to offset before the first shape is stamped
stylehow to transform the shape at each position as it is stamped
